name: Suspicious Cream of Mushroom Soup
desc:
A bisque that can be found everywhere. A small sip, and the weird taste already freezes you.

You can't help but pray: "Archons above, please tell me it's not dirt that I'm tasting..."

customize.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
customize.desc: A bisque that can be found everywhere. Blend cooked ingredients until they are liquefied, and heat the soup with cream until it is thickened up — voila! A simple dish that warms your stomach as well as your heart.

customize.name: Mushroom
customize.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

customize.name: Cream
customize.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

customize.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
customize.desc: A bisque that can be found everywhere. Blend cooked ingredients until they are liquefied, and heat the soup with cream until it is thickened up — voila! A simple dish that warms your stomach as well as your heart.

customize.name: Delicious Cream of Mushroom Soup
customize.desc: A bisque that can be found everywhere. Its creamy texture feels like a silky garment, and you seem to be dancing on the stage in this beautiful attire... The curtain has fallen, but the memory lingers.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.
